# Read User Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get information about a user on your team, such as name, roles, and app visibility.

## Getting User Information

- **List Users**: Get a list of the users on your team.

items.description: Get a list of the users on your team.
items.name: List Users

title: Read User Information
